AdminUserEmail.ConstraintDescription: User E-Mail must be a valid E-Mail address
AdminUserEmail.Description: The user E-Mail to access backstage UI

BackstageAdditionalScopes.ConstraintDescription: Scopes should be a space separated list of strings, allowing most printable ASCII characters
BackstageAdditionalScopes.Description: Additional scopes which Backstage will request from the configured identity provider on sign-in

BackstageLocalAssetDiscoveryRefreshMins.Description: Refresh Frequency (minutes) for Backstage catalog provider from the Backstage Local Asset Bucket

BackstageLogLevel.Description: Log-level to set for the Backstage resources

BackstageName.ConstraintDescription: Backstage Name must begin and end with an alphanumeric character and only consist of alphanumeric characters, space, hyphen(-) and underscore(_)
BackstageName.Description: Name to use for the Backstage Portal

BackstageOrg.ConstraintDescription: Backstage Org must begin and end with an alphanumeric character and only consist of alphanumeric characters, space, hyphen(-) and underscore(_)
BackstageOrg.Description: Organization Name to use for the Backstage Portal

CustomAcmCertificateArn.ConstraintDescription: Must be '' or a valid ACM certificate ARN
CustomAcmCertificateArn.Description: Optional when using a Public Hosted Zone with Route53. Required when HostedZoneId is Private or not provided. Provide a custom ACM Certificate ARN to use for TLS.

EnableMultiAccountDeployment.Description: Boolean flag that configures multi account deployment support

FullyQualifiedDomainName.ConstraintDescription: Fully Qualified Domain Name must be a valid domain name
FullyQualifiedDomainName.Description: Fully Qualified Domain Name for ACDP resources to be accessed. If using Route53, this must be a subset of the Route53 Zone Name

IdentityProviderId.ConstraintDescription: The identity provider ID must be a minimum of 3 characters.
IdentityProviderId.Description: The ID associated with the identity provider configurations used for validation and exchange.

IsPublicFacing.Description: Boolean flag that configures if public endpoints should be created for ACDP/Backstage resources. If true, the VPC must have an Internet Gateway

OrgsManagementAccountRegion.ConstraintDescription: Provide valid region name[Non government regions only]
OrgsManagementAccountRegion.Description: Region where org management accounts resources are located

OrgsManagementAwsAccountId.ConstraintDescription: AWS Account Id must be a 12-digit number. This is only required if EnableMultiAccountDeployment is set to true.
OrgsManagementAwsAccountId.Description: The 12-digit AWS account ID where Org Management Account resources are deployed. This is only required if EnableMultiAccountDeployment is set to true.

Route53HostedZoneId.ConstraintDescription: Must be '' or a valid Route53 Hosted Zone Id
Route53HostedZoneId.Description: Optional: Id of the Route53 Hosted Zone. Set to create records in Route53 for the required DNS entries.

S3LogExpirationDays.Description: The number of days before log bucket objects expire.

S3LogNoncurrentVersionExpirationDays.Description: The number of days before log bucket non-current versions are deleted after they've expired.

ShouldCreateCognitoUser.Description: Boolean flag that determined whether to create an Amazon Cognito user using the Admin user email.

UseBackstageAuthRedirectFlow.Description: Boolean flag that determines whether Backstage uses an experimental redirect flow instead of the default popup flow

Properties.Description: Attribute group for solution information
CloudFormation Role
Module Deploy CodeBuild Role

SecurityGroupEgress.Description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

S3 prefix for default ACDP catalog entities (templates, users, groups, etc.) in the local asset bucket

Region of the local bucket where ACDP Deployable resources are discovered

Bucket key prefix for the regional bucket where ACDP Deployable resources are discovered
Name of the regional asset bucket where ACDP Deployable resources are discovered
Region of the regional bucket where ACDP Deployable resources are discovered

rules_to_suppress.reason: Log retention lambda uses policies that require wildcard permissions
ec2 Network Interfaces permissions need to be wildcard

SecurityGroupEgress.Description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

Properties.Description: Optional when using a Public Hosted Zone with Route53. Required when HostedZoneId is Private or not provided. Provide a custom ACM Certificate ARN to use for TLS.
The name of the base domain to deploy in
Boolean value representing if public endpoints should be created for relevant resources
The id of the Route53 hosted zone to deploy in if Route53 is used
